verses.KJV: <jesus>For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son,</jesus> that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
verses.LSB: <jesus>For God so loved the world, that He gave His only Son</jesus>
verses.NWT: <jesus>For God loved the world so much that he gave his only-begotten Son</jesus>
verses.NKJV: <jesus>For God so loved the world that He gave His only begotten Son</jesus>
verses.NIV: <jesus>For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son</jesus>
verses.Interlinear: <jesus>οὕτως γὰρ ἠγάπησεν ὁ θεὸς τὸν κόσμον, ὥστε τὸν υἱὸν τὸν μονογενῆ ἔδωκεν</jesus>

verses.KJV: <father>This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.</father>
verses.LSB: <father>This is My beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.</father>
verses.NWT: <father>This is my Son, the beloved, whom I have approved.</father>
verses.NKJV: <father>This is My beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.</father>
verses.NIV: <father>This is my Son, whom I love; with him I am well pleased.</father>
verses.Interlinear: <father>οὗτός ἐστιν ὁ υἱός μου ὁ ἀγαπητός, ἐν ᾧ εὐδόκησα.</father>
